scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:deps && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:deps: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:sanity
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:sanity"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:sanity
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:sanity
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:sanity
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:sanity
